Title: Bahram Gur in the Green Pavilion
Medium: ink and pigments on laid paper
Description: This folio from Walters manuscript W.605 depicts Bahram Gur in the green pavilion. The folio is misbound.
Keywords: Islamic; Persian; Safavid; Book; Calligraphy; Codex; Colophon; Illumination; Illustration; Manuscript; Ornament; Iran; Literature -- Poetry
Provenance: Henry Walters, Baltimore [date and mode of acquisition unknown]; Walters Art Museum, 1931, by bequest.
Creator: Nizami Ganjavi (Azerbaijani, died 605 AH/AD 1209)
